data.name: SynchronizedMarkerLine
data.description: Required for synchronizing the last position in channels

data.name: HideInactiveNetworks
data.description: Required for hiding inactive networks from chat lists

data.name: PasswordChange
data.description: Required for changing passwords from the client

data.name: VerifyServerSSL
data.description: Required for verifying the SSL certificate of IRC networks you connect to

data.name: CustomRateLimits
data.description: Required for custom rate limits for IRC networks

data.name: AwayFormatTimestamp
data.description: Required for custom formatted timestamps in away messages

data.name: BufferActivitySync
data.description: Required for seeing activity of chats in the chat list

data.name: SenderPrefixes
data.description: Required for seeing prefix modes (+, @) of users in channels

data.name: RemoteDisconnect
data.description: Required for remote disconnects of your own clients

data.name: RichMessages
data.description: Required for seeing real names or IRCv3, Gravatar, or Libravatar avatars in messages

data.name: BacklogFilterType
data.description: Required for receiving past notifications after connecting
